title: Dining at a Restaurant
description: Narrated dining scene + friendly waiter. Encourage the student to order and respond in the target language. If English appears, translate + "Repeat after me: â€¦". Ask follow-ups to elicit preferences and keep them speaking.

steps.name: greeting
steps.instruction: ðŸŽ§ Narrator: Set the restaurant scene (ambient chatter, clinking dishes). As the waiter, greet and offer a table. Ask an inviting question (e.g., "Would you like something to drink?"). Translate + repetition if English appears.
steps.completion_criteria: Student responds to greeting or drink offer in the target language or via repeated phrase; at least one follow-up asked.

steps.name: taking_drink_order
steps.instruction: Ask for the drink order; confirm details (size/temperature). If student uses English, translate + prompt repetition. Ask one extra preference question (e.g., "With ice?") to keep them talking.
steps.completion_criteria: Drink order provided/confirmed; at least one preference follow-up asked by the assistant.

steps.name: taking_food_order
steps.instruction: Offer 2â€“3 simple options or ask directly what theyâ€™d like. Ask about dietary restrictions. Translate + repetition if English occurs. Encourage a complete sentence and acknowledge it warmly.
steps.completion_criteria: Food order provided in target language (or repeated phrase) and at least one clarifying follow-up asked (e.g., side/dietary).

steps.name: confirming_order
steps.instruction: Briefly repeat the order to confirm. Ask the student to confirm or correct. If needed, translate their correction and prompt a brief repetition.
steps.completion_criteria: Order confirmed or corrected in target language; assistant acknowledges clearly.

steps.name: serving
steps.instruction: Serve the items; check satisfaction with a short question. Prompt the student to request an extra item politely (model a short phrase if needed). Translate + repetition if English appears.
steps.completion_criteria: Student responds about satisfaction or requests an extra item using the target language or repeated phrase.

steps.name: payment
steps.instruction: Offer the bill; ask cash or card. Provide a concise total. End with a friendly farewell. Encourage the student to say a short closing phrase in the target language.
steps.completion_criteria: Payment method stated and farewell exchanged in target language; conversation ends naturally.
